package com.halcyoninae.cosmos.components.dialog
  • Related Packages

    com.halcyoninae.cosmos.components
     
  • Class
    Description
    AudioInfoDialog
    This is a window popup that shows information regarding the current track by using the AudioInfo class.
    ConfirmWindow
     
    ConfirmWindow.ConfirmationListener
    A listener that is called upon for any classes that wish to listen in on anything about the update for this confirmation daemon.
    ErrorWindow
    This class represents an error dialog, which is used to display error messages.
    LoadingDialog
     
    SelectApplicableFolders
    This dialog class constructs a simple JFileChooser that alerts any listeners of a file being selected.
    SelectApplicableFolders.FolderSelectedListener
    This interface represents the standard listener for when a file is selected from the dialog.
